data.title: Northeastern University
data.text:
Online appointment scheduling for your small business. Your customers schedule appointments through Bookings and automatically get confirmations, reminders, updates, and cancellation notices.

Break down the silos between your business processes and applications with Microsoft Dynamics 365.

Do more with the tool you already know. Discover and connect to data, model and analyze it, and visualize insights.

Create surveys, quizzes, and polls in minutes. Send them to anyone and easily see results in real time.

A secure messaging and work management application that lets you collaborate with others in and outside of your organization.

Store your files in one place, share them with others, and get to them from any device connected to the Internet.

Capture notes by typing, drawing, or writing. OneNote lets you organize and reuse your notes across all of your devices.

Use business-class email through a rich and familiar Outlook experience you can access from your desktop or a web browser.

Organize your contact info for all your friends, family, colleagues, and acquaintances in one place. It’s faster than ever to keep in touch.

Create new plans, organize and assign tasks, share files, chat about what you’re working on, and get progress updates with Planner.

Build mobile and web apps with the data your organization already uses.

(Formerly known as Flow) Create workflows between your apps, files, and data to automate time-consuming tasks so you can focus on what’s next.

Take your presentation to the next level. Design like a professional.

Share and manage content, knowledge, and applications to empower teamwork, quickly find information, and seamlessly collaborate across the organization.

Share videos of classes, meetings, presentations, training sessions, or other videos with other members of the Northeastern community.

Create and share engaging interactive reports, presentations, personal stories, and more. Sway does the design work for you.

Manage, prioritize, and complete the most important things you need to achieve every day.

Share videos of classes, meetings, presentations, training sessions, or other videos with other members of the Northeastern community.

Ideate and collaborate on a freeform canvas designed for pen, touch, and keyboard.

Bring out your best writing. Going from a blank page to a beautiful document is easier than ever.
